A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
To help combat the slew of stupidity from nacissitic SW "fans" - I must say this movie is all around brilliant. Cinematogrophy is overflowing with beauty\, directed in a elegant form\, edited to max cathartic pay-off\, all technicalties of TLJ are perfect. 

Spoilers

Taking down the jedi and sith was perfect.

Let go of the past... kill it.

Rian Johnson a genius.
